name: STEPHEN JANDECKA
text: This Pizza Hut is very large and has a great menu selection and has a wonderful all you can eat buffet that is economically priced! Got to love the heart-shaped pizza that Pizza Hut makes on Valentine's Day! Excellent marketing! Excellent food! Excellent service!

name: Shuba
text: An excellent place; well-lit and spacious. Waiting time was around 10 minutes. There were two veggie options - cheese and veggie pizzas. I ordered the veggie pizza with a thin crust which was pretty good. The cheese bread was delicious too. …More

name: Roland Czakó
text: Very good place, delicious food, nice people, fair deals.

name: Jillian Dworak
text: Absolutely disgusting! No plates for Buffet, no salad, no pizza, 8 tables maybe all 4 tops. I have worked for this company and the staff service was horrible! Obviously they were not prepped or prepared for buffet. Didn't hear phones so …More

name: T.R. Williams
text: The drivers are courteous. They are always on time and the food is always hot and delicious. I moved to the area a year ago. I have never had a bad experience with this Pizza Hut.

name: anne pi
text: Good food at a good price. The fries are surprisingly crispy and delicious. What really stood out was the excellent service. Our waitress Alex was super helpful and attentive. …More

name: Jesse Carter
text: One of my main places to grab something to eat. convenient location, well organised, and awesome service. I highly recommend them!

name: Bhavin Mehta
text: Very  good  stole  from  where  we  can  purchase  good  quality  pizza, variety  of  pizzas  available, we  also  can  purchase  variety  of  cold  drinks. On the  highway, we  just  have  to  go  and  purchase  these  pizzas, we  can …More

name: birs hynar
text: Good dinner, really nice staff. Loved it

name: Brandi Lindquist
text: They need to work on their customer service, a guy that i could hardly understand and a lady were very rude when i called to place my order. And then i called to upgrade it and they got mad.

name: Richard M
text: Used to really enjoy this buffet, but now it's almost a fight to have fresh pizza put out. The last couple of times there has only been two pizzas out and they were visibly old. Waitress wasn't very happy to hear about it. I think we'll take a break until they get things up to par.

name: JR Draper
text: Ordered a $23 stuffed crust pizza plus 16 wings over the phone ($40 total). Went to pick up the food and was told the marinara sauce is 50 cents extra. Maybe it's not a big deal to someone else, but to me that's like charging extra for …More

name: MARILEE SCHWEIZER
text: My husband and I enjoy coming here for pizza. Always delicious and great service! The Manager, Jessica is awesome!

name: C SummerlinSunshine
text: Great staff, delicious pizza

name: Gail Mondi
text: Pizza Hut in Boulder City was Super. The employees there were Awesome and polite. I live in Henderson close to Boulder City go there at least once a month

name: Roxanne Venable
text: The girl that took my order was so sweet,  I had a beer & needed a munchie so she offered me some pitas chips & hummus that she had! I also had one slice of the pizza I had ordered. Awesome!!

name: Judith Turner
text:
We prefer PizzaHut over Domino's for taste.
But the dough here hasn't been up to par for 5 months or so:  It's like they didn't take the time for the dough to "RISE".  Or may be stale ingredients or …More

name: Kurtis Magnuson
text: The last red roof in Nevada, please don't take this one away from us. The food is always really good here. I love it, we make special trips just to come to this Pizza Hut all the time.

name: Teri Decastro
text: Dawn the server was great. The buffet selection was good and never ran out of anything kept bringing hot food out pretty regularly not bad for 799 a person.

name: Bryan Reid
text: Service was very friendly.  However I order the garlic chicken pizza. There was very little chicken and like no bacon on the pizza, very disappointed in the amount of toppings.

name: darren mancusi
text:
We were there on 8/8/2019 and we were treated above and beyond with the service , There was a young man mike m, who went above and beyond for us
and everyone else in the store , i watched as he greeted everyone coming in to the store ,and also as he waited on the tables.

name: D A Bogdan
text: We love salad bar with our pizza

name: Andrew Ball
text: Great value and same high standard of pizza as always.

name: Lene
text: Would recommend this Pizza Hut to all fellow tourists driving from Las Vegas to Hoover Dam (and vice versa). We had a great time here; the pizza was delicious and Michael was a cute and friendly waiter!

name: Kayebis Santiago-Gordon
text: Great atmosphere. Excellent service. Server was friendly and prompt. Its been forever since I actually sat in a pizza place for a meal and this place showed me what I've been missing.

name: sherrillgraff creativehairnails
text:
Good food, friendly service.
The hand tossed supreme pizza is crispy and the topping are well balanced. Nice thin vegetables.  Well done staff. Yummy x10

name: Morgan Dodge
text: Everyone was super helpful and friendly. The gentleman taking our order was very patient.

name: Matthew Rice
text: The food is yummy. Prices are reasonable as well. I'll be back.

name: D Perdue Henderson
text: Pizza Hut borrows from other Pizza Huts whenever they're out of stock. This was one of those times. Teamwork!

name: mark smith
text: Had a wonderful buffet. Good variety. Made specifically what we asked for. No complaints about the food. However, our server, who MAY have been the manager, not certain.... She was a piece of work. Rude to me, and very rude to 2 other guests. Didn't downgrade the establishment based on her ignorant attitude.

name: Barbara Jackson
text: Food was delicious and the staff was courteous and helpful.

name: Jimmy Blasko
text: This is the only Pizza Hut with a buffet. We drive from Vegas just to sit down and eat pizza right out of the pan. These vintage locations are what made pizza hut, pizza hut!!

name: Applecart55@gmail.com Panjabi
text: Still has a salad bar, old school

name: Navendu Patel
text: Great service. We went here around 9 and ordered two thin crust veggie lover Pizza. They made an excellent Pizza,  how we had expected. The lady was nice to attend and serve us.

name: Sierra Labelle
text: Great service great prices and a really friendly environment

name: Alan Moore
text: Pan Hut favorite crust light sauce, extra cheese, pepperoni, banana peppers, pineapple, and onion!

name: Deanna Stevens
text: Wonderful experience! Very clean and fresh food! Our waitress Deana was knowledgeable and gave us tour sites around the area! Best Pizza Hut I have ever visited! Thank you Deana from NC

name: Manoj Kumar
text: Good people running this pizza hut. we enjoyed the food and the experience over there.

name: North Cote
text: Amazing service. Good place to stop before heading to AZ.

name: uchiha skates
text: Really nice workers here .

name: Cheryl Fisher
text: Friendly, attentive staff & good food

name: Rene Heggemann
text: Good Pizza, friendly Staff. Will come again if i get a Chance.

name: Crista Timothy
text: Stopped here and was accommodated by the loveliest ladies who helped get me some supplies to care for my daughter who was sick- would highly recommend .

name: Jill Chuculate
text: I'm in town on work and stopped in to get a to go order. Employee is talking disrespectfully about a customer that inquired about gluten free options to including cursing. He then proceeded to answer his cell phone and talk on it at the …More

name: Adriana Maciel
text: I don't know if its your employees or what, but either you get new employees who know how to cook a pizza or employees should cook the pizza longer. We have been ordering pizza from you guys for quite some time and never really had a …More

name: Katherine Burgess
text: Best pizza ever!! Crust was amazing! Veggies so beautifully arranged. We came to see the Hoover Dam and decided on lunch here. Our pizza was the best ever! Thank you, Dawn, our amazing, fun hostess/waitress. Boulder City, come on down!

name: Melissa Black
text: Pizza was horrible. I have complained in the past and they never do anything about it.

name: Kyle Connall
text: Great food! Great customer service!

name: Sally Contour
text: The Pizza Hut in Boulder City is different. The manager, Dina, is super-friendly and she keeps her restaurant pristine. Love the lunch time array of delicious pizzas and the salad bar is a huge plus.

name: Robert Smith
text: Quick service and clean dining area

name: Robert Lindley
text: Eat here. Only Pizza Hut buffet in Vegas area.  Buy 5, get 1 FREE.

name: Anita Spankin
text: The ladies there were VERY RUDE & unprofessional. I called in 25 min ahead for pickup and they sent my pizza on a delivery. When I got it, the puzza was cold. These ladies were so rude and I will NEVER go back!

name: Darla Madera
text: Great server with character, fast service and good food to boot

name: Bruce Young
text: Very polite and accomidating staff. 1800 miles from home and in casino motel recovering from hospital visit. Placed order twice over 3 days. Delivery is always hot. Drivers super accomidating to my ailment. Will continue to use while i am here and every future stop. Thanks to all the staff.

name: Ryan Ferguson
text: Waitress was very nice.  Great place to stop headed back to Las Vegas after visiting the Hoover Dam.

name: Georgi Dochev
text: The waitress was kind and thoughtful. The menu was standard, but there were discounts on the posters in front 2 for 1. There were much takeaway orders so kitchen had a lot of work but we get our order quick and it was fresh and delicious.

name: David Simmons
text:
Well What can you say,
Its Pizza Hut,
But our P.H. Has Thee Best Atmosphere out of All the ones I've been to..

name: shawncie jeannot
text: They are never late and they cut the pizza any shape u want .

name: Judith Prenner
text: The service was quick and very friendly. The place itself was somehow cold and the acoustic in the room is horrible.  There was a group of about 20 other people and it was very loud. But the pizzas were ok😉

name: Jay Lutt
text: Hungry and coming back from the dam? That was our story. Friendly staff and good PH. Visit the store to the east.

name: zaca78 Pereyra

text: good pizza 👌🏻👍🏻

name: Colin Young

text: Not a lot of variety of pizza in the buffet, but can put in for a request, wasn't too pleased with service maybe a bit on the smart ass side!  But I do like the idea of a sit down pizza hut restaurant. Would go back.

name: sean smith
text: If it was possible to put 0 stars i would. This website switched my pizza, wings, and breadsticks order to 2 orders of wings and 1 breadstick... i payed 18 dollars for this and was not compensated in any way shape or form. I hope they go out of buisness.
